events.title: Battle of Princeton (American Revolutionary War)
events.description: George Washington's Continental Army defeats British forces near Princeton, New Jersey, delivering a crucial morale boost and momentum following the victory at Trenton.
events.significance: Revived American morale and helped sustain the Revolutionary cause, setting the stage for subsequent American victories.

events.title: Alaska admitted as the 49th U.S. state
events.description: Alaska becomes the United States' 49th state, joining the Union after decades of territorial status.
events.significance: Expanded U.S. territory and resources; reshaped national demographics and geography as the largest state by area.

events.title: United States breaks diplomatic relations with Cuba
events.description: In the Cold War context, the United States severs diplomatic ties with Fidel Castro's Cuba, escalating tensions between the two nations.
events.significance: Dramatically intensified U.S.â€“Cuba hostility and influenced subsequent events, including later interventions and crises in the region.
